email_chain.subject: Freight Offer - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 12,000 MT of fertilizer from Santos to Durban under CIF terms. Our initial quote is USD 45 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN BREEZE, with a DWT of 50,000 and LOA of 200m. The laycan is set for 2024-04-10 to 2024-04-20. Please let us know if this works for you or if you have any specific requirements.

Best regards,
Laura Jensen
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider a lower rate, perhaps around USD 40 per metric ton? Additionally, could you provide details on the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Michael Ross
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your response. Considering your request, we can adjust the rate to USD 42 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day.

Please confirm if this revised rate is acceptable and if you need any further details on the laycan or vessel specifications.

Best regards,
Laura Jensen
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

The revised rate of USD 42 per metric ton is more in line with our expectations. However, we would like to confirm the laytime details. Could you specify the laytime start and end dates?

Best regards,
Michael Ross
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

The laytime will start on 2024-04-10 and end on 2024-04-20. We can offer a laytime of 7 days with the demurrage rate of USD 12,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Jensen
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Michael Ross
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Jensen
Maritime Brokers
